rules_text:
Dormant {1}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
Whenever an artifact or creature you control enters, teach up to one target creature vigilance. Then if you control four or more artifacts and Practice Automaton isn't a creature, it becomes a creature. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
